name: [Finger Detection] onFingerDetected - onFingerRemoved - onFingerDetectionTimeExpired
description:
The *onFingerDetected* is emitted when a finger is detected.

The *onFingerRemoved* is emitted when the finger is removed.

If a `fingerDetectionExpiryTime` is set, the *onFingerDetectionTimeExpired* is emitted when the finger detection time is expired.
